solution_line_template: Each steak knife set has {knives_per_set} steak knives and Elizabeth bought {num_sets_bought} sets so there are {knives_per_set}*{num_sets_bought} = <<{knives_per_set}*{num_sets_bought}={total_knives}>>{total_knives} steak knives in total
Each steak knife set costs ${cost_per_set} and she bought {num_sets_bought} sets so she spent ${cost_per_set}*{num_sets_bought} = $<<{cost_per_set}*{num_sets_bought}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
Both sets cost ${total_cost} and there are {total_knives} knives in total so each knife costs {total_cost}/{total_knives} = $<<{total_cost}/{total_knives}={cost_per_knife}>>{cost_per_knife} each
